select 0 dept_no, orga_no, null upper_dept_no, company_name dept_name, 0 ord, 0 depth, null last_dno, company_no from tbl_company where company_no = #{companyNo} union all
select d.dept_no, d.upper_dept_no, d.dept_name, d.ord, d.depth, d.last_dno, d.company_no, dm.orga_no from tbl_dept d join tbl_dept_mapping dm on d.dept_no = dm.dept_no where (upper_dept_no = #{upperDeptNo} OR upper_dept_no is null )and depth = #{depth} and company_no = #{companyNo}

select e.emp_no , o.orga_no , e.emp_name , em.emp_rank , e.username , FN_GET_HIERARCHY_ORGA(#{orgaNo}) as path , e.emp_phone from tbl_emp e join tbl_emp_mapping em on e.emp_no = em.emp_no join tbl_orga o on o.orga_no=em.orga_no where o.upper_orga_no=#{orgaNo} ;

select e.emp_no , em.orga_no , e.emp_name , e.username , em.emp_rank , FN_GET_HIERARCHY_ORGA(#{orgaNo}) as path , e.emp_phone , e.email , e.filename , e.uuid from tbl_emp e join tbl_emp_mapping em on e.emp_no = em.emp_no where em.orga_no=#{orgaNo} ;
